settings.title: FriendsOfFlarum Open Collective
settings.use_legacy_api_key_help: If you have a legacy API key, you may keep using it, but it is recommended to switch to a Personal Token. Currently, personal tokens seem to work in API Key mode (i.e. "API-Key" header), but this is not documented.
settings.api_key_help: This authentication method is deprecated. Please consider switching to a Personal Token.
settings.personal_token_help: Create a personal token at https://opencollective.com/applications. This token is used to fetch your backer information from Open Collective.
settings.slug_help: Enter your Open Collective collective slug (the part after opencollective.com/ in your collective URL).
settings.group_help: Select which Flarum user group recurring backers should be added to. Users will be automatically added when they become recurring backers and moved to the one-time group (if configured) when their subscription ends.
settings.onetime_group_help: Select which Flarum user group one-time backers should be added to. If not set, one-time backers will not be managed. When a recurring backer cancels their subscription, they will be moved to this group.
